channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- Emlog Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- Emlog Pro

item.title: CVE-2022-1526|2024-08-03T00:10:03.367Z -- unspecified -- emlog%20pro
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, was found in Emlog Pro up to 1.2.2. This affects the POST parameter handling of articles. The manipulation with the input <script>alert(1);</script> leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely but it requires a signup and login by the attacker. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
